# PED::SET_PED_SWEAT

## Summary
Sets the sweatiness of a ped by percentage

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped: Index - the index of the ped to clear the environment dirt effect from
* **FLOAT** amount: The sweatiness to set to (0 to 1)

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sweat is set to 100.0 or 0.0 in the decompiled scripts.
